import CryptoJS from'crypto-js';// Singleton pattern for SQL.js initialization

export async function createDatabaseFromBuffer(dbBuffer){const SQL=await getSqlJs();return new SQL.Database(new Uint8Array(dbBuffer));}export async function decryptDatabase(encrypted,password){try{// The key from Signal's config is a long hex string. We only need the first 32 bytes (64 hex chars) for the AES key.

const ciphertext=CryptoJS.lib.WordArray.create(encrypted.slice(16));// Decrypt using AES-256-CBC
const decrypted=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt({ciphertext:ciphertext},key,{iv:iv,mode:CryptoJS.mode.CBC,padding:CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7});// Convert the decrypted WordArray back to a Uint8Array
const decryptedBytes=decrypted.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Latin1);const decryptedArray=new Uint8Array(decryptedBytes.length);for(let i=0;i<decryptedBytes.length;i++){decryptedArray[i]=decryptedBytes.charCodeAt(i);}return decryptedArray.buffer;}catch(error){console.error('Error decrypting database:',error);throw new Error('Failed to decrypt database.
